Articles.Content:
I can model(I am currently making a RL scale replica of the CASTOR-30 upper stage SRB, but it is on hold as the unity person I am working with is still on holiday)l but I cant model good enough for a part I really want in game, a replica of the solar panels from the nasa spacecraft MAVEN scaled to fit on the AIES Explon-6D probe core (the large gold one). could someone make this for me?

link to my current work:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57942-WIP-Castor-30-Mod

Edited January 7, 2014 by DarthVader

Instead of apologizing for being annoying you should put your request in the subject of the post. It would be less annoying and you'd have a FAR greater chance of finding someone to help you if they could know, at a glance, that you were asking for their help.

I can model(I am currently making a RL scale replica of the CASTOR-30 upper stage SRB, but it is on hold as the unity person I am working with is still on holiday)l but I cant model good enough for a part I really want in game, a replica of the solar panels from the nasa spacecraft MAVEN scaled to fit on the AIES Explon-6D probe core (the large gold one). could someone make this for me?

link to my current work:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57942-WIP-Castor-30-Mod

I also am disturbed that you could to ambonden your team mate like that and find somebody to replace him...
